text: Frank John Gorshin, Jr. (April 5, 1933 â€“ May 17, 2005) was an American movie, television, stage, voice, radio actor, and comedian. He was known for his role as The Riddler in Batman. Gorshin was born in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. He studied at Peabody High School and at Carnegie Mellon University. Gorshin was married to Christina Randazzo from 1957 until his death in 2005. They had a son, Mitchell Gorshin.
